pageContext._xxxcollectionOwnerNamextxt: Department of Special Collections, University of California at Los Angeles (UCLA)
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Contains mimeographed summaries of radio broadcasts, newspaper accounts, various special reports and publications in Japanese prepared by the Allied Translator and Interpreter Section of the Intelligence Office during the occupation of Japan, 1945-1947. Audio discs of Mashbir's Japanese broadcasts have been transferred to the UCLA Film and Television Archive.
